New Records: Taskin Ahmed produced career best figures of 4/25
Key Match Events: Bangladesh bounced back from an insipid batting show to defeat the Netherlands by nine runs
Taskin Ahmed inflicted a twin blow on the first two balls
Colin Ackermann fought valiantly in his 48-ball 62 but did not get support from the other batters
Bangladesh then effected two run outs of Max O'Dowd (8) and Tom Cooper (0) inside the Power Play
Shakib Al Hasan removed his counterpart Scott Edwards (16) with a delivery going down the leg side
Miscellaneous Highlights: Bangladesh's first ever win in the second round of a T20 World Cup
The Netherlands on the other hand will take on India
Bangladesh's next match is against South Africa in Sydney on Thursday
Others: Pacer Taskin Ahmed was the pick of the Bangladesh bowlers with four wickets
The Netherlands were dismissed for 135 in 20 overs
Van Meekeren triggered the Bangladesh collapse dismissing Soumya Sarkar (14; 14b; 2x4) inside the Power Play
